General.name: Note Distance
General.description: Adjusts the travel distance of notes during osu!standard gameplay (does not affect note reaction time).

General.name: Disable Mouse Buttons
General.description: Disables the use of mouse buttons for gameplay.
General.warning: If you turn off mouse buttons, you can only use the set keys for alternative clicking.

General.name: Tablet Mode
General.description: Switches input method to tablet for better precision.

General.name: Automatic Mod Activation
General.description: Automatically activates preferred mods at the start of a new song.

General.name: Mod Overlays
General.description: Displays mod overlays during gameplay to show active modifiers.

General.name: Pause Buffer
General.description: Sets a buffer time before pausing the game to avoid accidental pauses.

General.name: Unpause Buffer
General.description: Sets a buffer time before unpausing the game.

Appearance & HUD.name: Background Brightness
Appearance & HUD.description: Adjusts the brightness of the background during gameplay to reduce distractions.

Appearance & HUD.name: AP/FC Indicator
Appearance & HUD.description: Changes the color of the combo display depending on the current clear report.

Keybindings.name: osu!standard
Keybindings.description: Allows players to reassign key bindings for gameplay actions. Keymapping for osu!standard corresponds to the alternative clicking keys, such as Z and X.
